title: Taxonomic Expert
description: A Taxonomic Expert is a person who is an expert in the field of taxonomy, the science of defining and naming groups of biological organisms on the basis of shared characteristics.

@id.description: The unique identifier of the Taxonomic Expert object

@type.description: The type of the object, in this case TaxonomicExpert

name.description: The name of the Taxonomic Expert

email.description: The email of the Taxonomic Expert
